metadata.desc: You love nature, traveling and discovering new exciting places - Explore BG will guide you on  your journey into the unknown.

section-top.h1: Looking for adventures or just want to visit a new place
section-top.h2: Explore BG is the perfect choice

quote.text: If we were meant to stay in one place, we'd have roots instead of feet.
quote.author: Rachel Wolchin
